member.name: F:Configs.ConfigsTools.ConfigsFileName
member.summary: The name of the configurations file. File extension included. Change this if you want to change the file's name.

member.name: M:Configs.ConfigsTools.Save
member.summary: Saves the instance that inherents from ConfigsTools to the file as json.

member.name: M:Configs.ConfigsTools.GetConfigs``1
member.summary: Gets the current configurations from the configurations file.
member.typeparam: The type of the configurations file model.
member.returns: An instance of the configurations file model filled with the current configurations in the configurations file. Creates a new file and returns a new instance of the class/model if no file was found.
